The footage was published on Facebook on: 2020, and has been viewed more than 17,000 times.
The video shows a group of Caucasian peo: era uniforms of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, with a float that has "China" written on it in simplified Chinese characters.
The post: s caption translates to English as a parade in France celebrating China's victory against the epidemic, with the pro-Chinese Communist Party song "No Communist Party, no new China" playing in the background.
The claim is false: as the parade actually took place in Italy during an annual carnival in February 2020, as confirmed by a news article from Italian newspaper La Nazione and several photos from the same procession.
